==Profile==
<!-- detailed story/lore information goes here -->
Susan is a [[Mondstadt]] citizen who came to [[Inazuma]] with her husband due to his business trip. She is unable to leave due to the [[Sakoku Decree]] and is traveling to make the most of her stay. She is traveling alone as her husband is too lazy to join her.
